io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive

Class MecanumDrive

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.DriveSystem
      • io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.MecanumDrive
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TankDrive

    public class MecanumDrive
extends DriveSystem
    A MecanumDrive is a DriveSystem that represents a system using mecanum wheels.
    Author:
    Zach Ohara

    • Field Detail

      • MOVE_POWER_SCALE

        public static final double MOVE_POWER_SCALE
        The multiplier for all motor powers. Decreasing this number can be used to impose speed limits. Increasing this number will yield strange results, so please don't increase this number beyond 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DRIVE_POWER_WEIGHT

        public static final double DRIVE_POWER_WEIGHT
        The relative weight of the forward vector over other vectors. Increasing this number will make the forward/backward movement more responsive, but at the expense of making the other vectors less responsive.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STRAFE_POWER_WEIGHT

        public static final double STRAFE_POWER_WEIGHT
        The relative weight of the right vector over other vectors. Increasing this number will make the left/right movement more responsive, but at the expense of making the other vectors less responsive.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROTATE_POWER_WEIGHT

        public static final double ROTATE_POWER_WEIGHT
        The relative weight of the clockwise vector over other vectors. Increasing this number will make spinning responsive, but at the expense of making the other vectors less responsive.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • MecanumDrive

        public MecanumDrive(DriveMotorSet wheels)
        Constructs a new MecanumDrive with the given DriveMotorSet as a base.
        Parameters:
        wheels - the DriveMotorSet of this drive system.
        See Also:
        DriveSystem.DriveSystem(DriveMotorSet)

      • MecanumDrive

        public MecanumDrive(java.lang.String[] motornames)
        Constructs a new MecanumDrive that uses the motors with the given names.
        Parameters:
        motornames - the names of the motors to use with this drive system.
        See Also:
        DriveSystem.DriveSystem(String[])

    • Method Detail

      • setMovement

        public boolean setMovement(double forward,
                           double clockwise)
        Sets the power of the motors on the robot so that the robot moves as described by the two vectors.
        Specified by:
        setMovement in class DriveSystem
        Parameters:
        forward - the forward-driving vector; between -1 and 1.
        clockwise - the clockwise-spinning vector; between -1 and 1.
        Returns:
        the success of the operation.

      • strafe

        public boolean strafe(int power)
        Strafes (moves sideways) with the given power.
        Parameters:
        power - the right-facing power; between -1 and 1.
        Returns:
        the success of the operation.

      • traverse

        public boolean traverse(boolean right,
                        int power)
        Drives and strafes (moves sideways) with the given (equal) power.
        Parameters:
        right - true if the robot should strafe to the right, or false if the robot should strafe to the left.
        power - the forward power; between -1 and 1.
        Returns:
        the success of the operation.

      • strafeSeconds

        public boolean strafeSeconds(int power,
                             float seconds)
        Strafes (moves sideways) with the given power and for the given amount of time, and then stops.
        Parameters:
        power - the right-facing power; between -1 and 1.
        seconds - the time to move for.
        Returns:
        the success of the operation.

      • traverseSeconds

        public boolean traverseSeconds(boolean right,
                               int power,
                               float seconds)
        Drives and strafes (moves sideways) with the given (equal) power and for the given amount of time, and then stops.
        Parameters:
        right - true if the robot should strafe to the right, or false if the robot should strafe to the left.
        power - the forward power; between -1 and 1.
        seconds - the time to move for.
        Returns:
        the success of the operation.

      • setMovement

        public boolean setMovement(double forward,
                           double right,
                           double clockwise)
        Sets the power of the motors on the robot so that the robot moves as described by the three vectors.
        Parameters:
        forward - the forward-driving vector; between -1 and 1.
        right - the right-strafing vector; between -1 and 1.
        clockwise - the clockwise-spinning vector; between -1 and 1.
        Returns:
        the success of the operation.
